project.name: The Mixing Mentor
project.description: A VST3 plugin that acts as a virtual mentor for mixing, analyzing tracks against AI-learned targets and teaching users how to fix them using DAW stock plugins

phases.name: Project Setup & Infrastructure
phases.description: Initialize project structure, version control, build system, and development environment

tasks.name: Initialize Git Repository
tasks.description: Create git repo with branching strategy (main, dev, feature/* branches)

subtasks.name: Create main branch with initial commit
Setup .gitignore for C++ and Python projects

tasks.name: Setup Folder Structure
tasks.description: Create project directory structure matching tech stack requirements

tasks.name: Setup CMake Build System
tasks.description: Configure CMake 3.25+ for cross-platform C++ and ONNX Runtime linking

subtasks.name: Create root CMakeLists.txt with JUCE configuration
Configure ONNX Runtime linking for Windows/macOS

tasks.name: Setup Python Development Environment
tasks.description: Configure Python 3.10+ with training dependencies

subtasks.name: Create requirements.txt with librosa, scikit-learn, onnx, numpy, pandas
Create Python virtual environment setup script

tasks.name: Setup Documentation & Wiki
tasks.description: Consolidate existing docs and create development guide

subtasks.name: Create DEVELOPMENT.md with environment setup instructions

phases.name: The Brain (Python AI Model)
phases.description: Create training dataset, feature extraction pipeline, and export ONNX model

tasks.name: Dataset Generation Strategy
tasks.description: Define Suno AI prompts and recording workflow for Good/Bad audio pairs

subtasks.name: Define Gold Set prompts for Metalcore (Kick, Snare, Bass)
Define Flawed Set prompts with specific flaw types
Create metadata schema for labeling (class, genre, instrument, flaw_type)

tasks.name: Generate Training Dataset
tasks.description: Generate 100+ Suno AI tracks for Good/Flawed pairs across genres

subtasks.name: Generate 30 Flawed Metalcore Kick drums (various flaw types)

tasks.name: Feature Extraction Pipeline
tasks.description: Implement librosa-based feature extraction for 64-float fingerprint

subtasks.name: Create batch processing function for entire dataset

tasks.name: Data Preprocessing
tasks.description: Normalize audio, create training labels, prepare datasets

subtasks.name: Create label generation logic (Good = 0 correction, Bad = difference vector)
Create data validation checks (missing values, outliers)

tasks.name: Model Architecture & Training
tasks.description: Implement Random Forest/MLP Regressor with hyperparameter tuning

subtasks.name: Log model performance metrics (RÂ², MAE, inference time)

tasks.name: ONNX Export & Optimization
tasks.description: Convert trained models to ONNX format with inference time verification

subtasks.name: Export Random Forest models to ONNX
Export MLP models with quantization to ONNX
Create ONNX validation script (verify output shapes/values)

tasks.name: Python Testing & Validation
tasks.description: Unit tests, integration tests, and model validation

subtasks.name: Test feature extraction with known audio samples
Test ONNX inference matches scikit-learn output
Test ONNX model with random input vectors

phases.name: The Shell (C++/JUCE Plugin Architecture)
phases.description: Build core plugin framework, singleton system, and inter-instance communication

tasks.name: Create Basic JUCE Plugin Project
tasks.description: Generate JUCE project with VST3 target, basic processor and editor

subtasks.name: Use Projucer to generate initial VST3 plugin template
Test plugin loads in Studio One (AU/VST3)

tasks.name: Implement Data Structures
tasks.description: Create TrackProfile, AudioFingerprint, and GenreTarget structs

subtasks.name: Define TrackProfile struct with ID, name, instrument, genre fields
Define AudioFingerprint struct (spectral, dynamics, issues fields)
Define GenreTargetProfile struct with ideal spectrum/dynamics

tasks.name: Implement Session Manager (Singleton)
tasks.description: Create thread-safe global state manager for inter-instance communication

subtasks.name: Implement registerTrack() method with thread safety
Unit tests for thread safety with concurrent access

tasks.name: Implement Track Profile System
tasks.description: Create per-instance track representation and lifecycle management

subtasks.name: Implement TrackProfiler constructor with UUID generation

tasks.name: Implement Audio Processing Pipeline
tasks.description: Create processor class with FFT analysis and fingerprinting

subtasks.name: Unit tests for parameter state management

tasks.name: Implement Feature Extraction (C++)
tasks.description: Port Python feature extraction to C++ for real-time analysis

subtasks.name: Implement FFT-based spectral energy extraction (32 bands)
Implement MFCC extraction using library (kissfft or juce::dsp)
Unit tests comparing C++ output with Python librosa

tasks.name: Implement State Management (Active/Passive)
tasks.description: Create state machine for CPU resource management

subtasks.name: Define Active (GUI open), Passive (GUI closed), RescanState
Implement state transition logic with guards

tasks.name: Integrate ONNX Runtime
tasks.description: Link ONNX Runtime, implement inference wrapper

subtasks.name: Download and configure ONNX Runtime C++ SDK
Implement inference execution with 64-float input vector
Unit tests for inference with known model outputs

tasks.name: C++ Testing & Validation
tasks.description: Unit tests, integration tests, build verification

subtasks.name: Setup Catch2 or Google Test framework
Verify plugin compiles on Windows (MSVC) and macOS (Clang)

phases.name: The Brain Integration (AI Inference in C++)
phases.description: Integrate ONNX models into plugin, implement analysis engine, decision tree logic

tasks.name: Create Analysis Engine
tasks.description: Implement core decision tree: identify -> target -> analyze -> compare -> display

subtasks.name: Implement analyze() method receiving raw audio buffer
Implement local comparison (current vs target spectrum)
Implement global comparison (masking checks against other tracks)

tasks.name: Implement Masking Detection
tasks.description: Create frequency collision detection between tracks

subtasks.name: Unit tests with known frequency pairs

tasks.name: Implement Accumulator Logic
tasks.description: Create layer-based mixing hierarchy (Drums -> Bass -> Guitars -> Vocals)

subtasks.name: Define Foundation, Groove, Body, Soul layers
Implement layer validation (e.g., warn if vocals before drums)
Unit tests for layer hierarchy validation

tasks.name: Create Genre Target Database
tasks.description: Load Metalcore (and future genre) target profiles

subtasks.name: Define Metalcore Kick target (spectrum, dynamics, attack/release)
Unit tests for genre data loading

tasks.name: Implement Advice Generation
tasks.description: Create prioritized advice text and correction vectors

subtasks.name: Create advice template system (Mad Libs style)
Unit tests for advice priority sorting

tasks.name: Integrate ONNX with Analysis Pipeline
tasks.description: Connect inference to feature extraction and advice generation

subtasks.name: Test end-to-end: audio -> features -> inference -> advice
Integration tests with test audio files

tasks.name: Integration Testing & Validation
tasks.description: Full end-to-end tests from audio to UI updates

subtasks.name: Test with Metalcore Kick audio sample
Test with Metalcore Bass audio sample
Test masking detection with known frequency collisions
Verify correct advice generation for each scenario

phases.name: The UX (User Interface & Visualization)
phases.description: Build GUI with Ghost Needle, Target Curve, Text Feed, and Session Setup

tasks.name: Create Basic GUI Framework
tasks.description: Setup JUCE Editor, layout system, and component hierarchy

subtasks.name: Setup main layout: Header | Left Feed | Right Visuals
Implement resizable window with min/max dimensions

tasks.name: Implement Header Component
tasks.description: Display instrument name, genre selector, and status indicator

tasks.name: Implement Session Setup Screen
tasks.description: Build band lineup checklist and genre selector

subtasks.name: Create instrument icon grid (Kick, Snare, Bass, Guitars, Vocals)
Test user flow (select instruments -> select genre -> confirm)

tasks.name: Implement Text Feed Component
tasks.description: Display prioritized advice with status indicators

subtasks.name: Create advice item component (text + status badge)
Implement status indicators (Pending, Good, Failed, Hidden)

tasks.name: Implement Ghost Needle Component
tasks.description: Create dual-needle gain reduction meter visualization

subtasks.name: Implement linear meter background (-60dB to 0dB scale)
Implement grey needle for actual gain reduction
Implement gold ghost needle for target gain reduction

tasks.name: Implement Target Curve Component
tasks.description: Create EQ difference curve visualization (ideal vs actual)

subtasks.name: Implement red curve for boosted bands (above ideal)
Implement blue curve for cut bands (below ideal)

tasks.name: Implement Footer/Context Component
tasks.description: Display relational advice and warnings

subtasks.name: Implement context text area (masking, sidechain info)
Implement warning indicator (yellow when missing foundation)

tasks.name: Implement Parameter-to-UI Binding
tasks.description: Create ValueTree listeners for real-time parameter updates

subtasks.name: Bind EQ curve data to TargetCurveComponent
Test real-time updates when state changes

tasks.name: Style & Theme System
tasks.description: Create consistent colors, fonts, and visual language

subtasks.name: Select and embed fonts (Roboto or similar)
Create icon assets for instruments and status

tasks.name: UI Testing & Polish
tasks.description: Test all components, responsive layout, user workflows

subtasks.name: Test feed component with 5+ advice items
Test target curve rendering with various EQ data

phases.name: Studio One Integration & Testing
phases.description: Test plugin in Studio One, implement DAW-specific features, comprehensive testing

tasks.name: DAW Integration Setup
tasks.description: Configure Studio One host detection and plugin parameters

subtasks.name: Verify plugin loads in Studio One Pro+ 6.5+
Test plugin on multiple track types (Audio, Instrument)

tasks.name: Studio One Stock Plugin Mapping
tasks.description: Verify parameter mapping to Compressor and Pro EQ 3

subtasks.name: Map Studio One Compressor parameters (Ratio, Attack, Release, Threshold)
Create lookup tables for ratio/attack/release conversions
Map Pro EQ 3 band parameters (LC, LF, LMF, HMF, HF)
Test with real Studio One instances

tasks.name: Feature Testing (Metalcore Genre)
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of all features with Rock/Metal tracks

subtasks.name: Test instrument identification on Metalcore Kick
Test Kick analysis and EQ advice generation
Test Ghost Needle visualization with compression advice
Test Snare analysis and transient advice
Test Bass analysis and sidechain detection
Verify advice priority sorting (critical -> major -> minor)

tasks.name: Real-Time Performance Testing
tasks.description: Verify low-latency analysis on various CPU loads

subtasks.name: Measure feature extraction latency per block
Measure total analysis latency (feature + inference + advice)
Test on low-end CPU (i5-8th gen) and high-end (i9)

tasks.name: GUI Stability & Responsiveness Testing
tasks.description: Test UI under various conditions and user interactions

subtasks.name: Test session setup flow with all instrument combinations
Test real-time text feed updates without glitches
Test ghost needle smooth animation at various frame rates
Test target curve rendering with dense EQ data
Test long session stability (8+ hour session)

tasks.name: Error Handling & Edge Cases
tasks.description: Test robustness against invalid inputs and edge cases

subtasks.name: Test with very quiet audio (below -60dB LUFS)
Test with missing ONNX model file
Test with DAW sample rate changes

tasks.name: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
tasks.description: Real-world mixing scenarios with actual music projects

subtasks.name: Test with real Metalcore song project (drums focus)
Test with full band mix (drums, bass, guitars, vocals)
Verify Ghost Needle matches compressor setting
Verify EQ advice matches target curve
Get feedback from test users (mix engineers)
Iterate on advice clarity and usefulness

tasks.name: Cross-Platform Testing
tasks.description: Verify plugin works on Windows and macOS

subtasks.name: Build and test on Windows 10/11 with MSVC
Test on macOS 11+ with Clang (Intel & Apple Silicon)
Verify all features work identically on both platforms
Test with various Studio One versions (6.0, 6.5+)
Test with different DAW configurations (system tracks, etc.)

tasks.name: Documentation & Release Prep
tasks.description: Create user guide, API docs, and release notes

tasks.name: Final QA & Sign-Off
tasks.description: Final comprehensive testing before release

subtasks.name: Final security review (no injection, buffer overflow)

phases.name: Licensing Integration (VST Plugin)
phases.description: Implement license validation, trial management, and activation system

tasks.name: Implement Machine Fingerprinting
tasks.description: Generate unique hardware ID (CPU + MAC + HDD serial) with VM detection

subtasks.name: Unit tests on Windows and macOS VMs

tasks.name: Implement Trial Period Management
tasks.description: 14-day trial from first launch with encrypted persistent state

subtasks.name: Implement trial start date persistence (Windows registry)
Implement trial start date persistence (macOS keychain)
Implement AES encryption for trial data
Implement trial expiration check and feature locking

tasks.name: Implement Online Activation
tasks.description: REST API client for license validation (HTTPS to nextgennoise.com/api/v1/activate)

subtasks.name: Implement HTTPS client using JUCE or libcurl
Implement retry logic with exponential backoff
Implement error handling (network, invalid key, etc.)

tasks.name: Implement Offline Activation
tasks.description: Generate activation request files and parse offline license responses

subtasks.name: Implement RSA encryption for request payload

tasks.name: Implement License UI Dialogs
tasks.description: Activation dialog, trial expiration warning, purchase redirect

subtasks.name: Implement activation dialog UI (enter license key, online/offline toggle)
Implement purchase button linking to nextgennoise.com/buy

tasks.name: Anti-Piracy Measures
tasks.description: Debugger detection, code obfuscation, periodic re-validation

subtasks.name: Implement debugger detection on macOS (sysctl checks)
Implement code obfuscation for license validation logic

phases.name: Web Infrastructure (Backend API)
phases.description: Build Node.js/Python API server with user auth, licensing, payments, analytics

tasks.name: Setup Backend API Server
tasks.description: Initialize Node.js/Python project with Express/FastAPI, CORS, environment config

subtasks.name: Choose tech stack (Node.js/Express or Python/FastAPI or Go/Gin)
Setup logging and error handling middleware

tasks.name: Implement Authentication System
tasks.description: User registration, JWT login/logout, password reset, session management

subtasks.name: Implement user registration endpoint with email verification
Implement JWT token generation and verification
Implement forgot password flow with reset links

tasks.name: Implement License Management API
tasks.description: License key generation, activation, deactivation, status checking

subtasks.name: Implement license key generation algorithm (UUID + validation checksum)
Implement activation endpoint (validate key + hardware ID)
Implement deactivation endpoint (free up activation slot)
Implement max activation slot enforcement (2 machines default)

tasks.name: Integrate Payment Processing
tasks.description: Stripe API integration, checkout sessions, webhook handling

subtasks.name: Setup Stripe API account and keys
Implement automatic license generation on payment success
Implement email delivery of license key
Implement refund handling and license revocation

tasks.name: Implement Analytics Collection
tasks.description: Telemetry endpoint, usage tracking, privacy-compliant data storage

subtasks.name: Store telemetry: session_duration, features_used, DAW_type, OS
Implement crash report collection and storage

tasks.name: Setup Database Migrations
tasks.description: Knex.js or Alembic migrations, schema versioning, seed data

subtasks.name: Create initial schema migration (users, licenses, activations, etc.)
Create seed data migration (test users, test licenses)

tasks.name: API Testing
tasks.description: Unit tests, integration tests, load testing, security testing

tasks.name: Deploy to Production
tasks.description: CI/CD setup, deployment to AWS/DigitalOcean, SSL/TLS, CDN

subtasks.name: Deploy to AWS EC2 or DigitalOcean

phases.name: Frontend (Customer Portal)
phases.description: Build React/Vue customer portal for purchases, downloads, account management

tasks.name: Setup Frontend Project
tasks.description: Initialize Next.js/Nuxt, TailwindCSS, routing, API client

tasks.name: Build Homepage
tasks.description: Hero section, feature highlights, pricing CTA, footer

subtasks.name: Create hero section with product demo video embed
Create feature highlights section (Ghost Needle, AI Mentor, etc.)
Create footer with links and copyright

tasks.name: Build Authentication Pages
tasks.description: Login, register, forgot password, email verification

subtasks.name: Create login page with form validation
Create register page with email verification prompt
Create forgot password page with email reset flow

tasks.name: Build User Dashboard
tasks.description: Overview, license management, downloads, support tickets

subtasks.name: Create license management page (view, deactivate machines)

tasks.name: Build Purchase Flow
tasks.description: Pricing page, Stripe checkout, success confirmation

subtasks.name: Create pricing page with plan comparison
Create success page (display license key, confirm email)

tasks.name: Build Documentation Site
tasks.description: Installation guide, quick start, feature reference, FAQ

subtasks.name: Setup markdown-based docs system (MDX or similar)

tasks.name: Responsive Design
tasks.description: Mobile, tablet, desktop optimization

subtasks.name: Test with various browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)

tasks.name: SEO Optimization
tasks.description: Meta tags, sitemap, structured data, Google indexing

subtasks.name: Setup meta tags for all pages

tasks.name: Deploy Frontend
tasks.description: Deploy to Vercel/Netlify, domain setup, CDN

subtasks.name: Configure environment variables for API endpoints

phases.name: Database Design & Implementation
phases.description: PostgreSQL schema, migrations, ORM setup, Redis caching, backups

tasks.name: Schema Design
tasks.description: Design normalized tables, relationships, indexes, ER diagram

tasks.name: Setup PostgreSQL
tasks.description: Provision PostgreSQL instance, connection pooling, read replicas

subtasks.name: Provision PostgreSQL instance (AWS RDS or DigitalOcean)
Setup read replicas for horizontal scaling
Configure security groups and network access

tasks.name: Create Migration Scripts
tasks.description: Initial schema migration, seed data, version control

subtasks.name: Create seed data migration (test users, licenses)

tasks.name: Implement Database Access Layer
tasks.description: ORM setup, repository pattern, transactions

subtasks.name: Setup ORM (Prisma/TypeORM for Node, SQLAlchemy for Python)

tasks.name: Setup Redis for Caching
tasks.description: Redis instance, cache JWT tokens, license status, sessions

subtasks.name: Provision Redis instance (AWS ElastiCache or DigitalOcean)
Implement license validation result caching (5-minute TTL)

tasks.name: Backup Strategy
tasks.description: Automated backups, point-in-time recovery, backup testing

tasks.name: Security Hardening
tasks.description: SSL/TLS, least privilege, parameterized queries, audit logging

subtasks.name: Setup database user roles with least privilege

phases.name: Installer & Distribution
phases.description: Windows/macOS installers, code signing, notarization, auto-update system

tasks.name: Create Windows Installer
tasks.description: Inno Setup script, dependencies, VST3 installation, code signing

subtasks.name: Include ONNX Runtime DLLs in installer
Implement registry entries for trial tracking

tasks.name: Create macOS Installer
tasks.description: pkgbuild package, code signing, notarization

subtasks.name: Setup code signing with Developer ID certificate

tasks.name: Setup Auto-Update System
tasks.description: Version checking, update downloads, prompt user

subtasks.name: Implement version check endpoint (VST calls nextgennoise.com/api/v1/version)
Implement user prompt for available updates
Test update download and installation flow

tasks.name: Create Installers CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: GitHub Actions builds, S3 upload, download link updates

subtasks.name: Create GitHub Actions workflow for Windows build
Create GitHub Actions workflow for macOS build
Setup S3 bucket for installer uploads
Implement automated installer signing in CI
Test full CI/CD pipeline with release tag

tasks.name: Test Installation
tasks.description: Test on clean VMs, verify dependencies, uninstall/reinstall, upgrades

subtasks.name: Test Windows installer on clean Windows 10 VM
Test Windows installer on clean Windows 11 VM
Test macOS installer on clean macOS 11+ VM
Verify all dependencies installed (ONNX Runtime, models)

phases.name: Email, Admin, Monitoring & Security
phases.description: Email system, admin dashboard, error tracking, monitoring, compliance

tasks.name: Setup Email Service
tasks.description: smtp.com integration for transactional emails, Mailchimp for marketing

subtasks.name: Configure smtp.com SMTP credentials in backend (host, port, auth)
Setup Mailchimp API integration for audience sync and automation
Create email helper modules (nodemailer for smtp.com, mailchimp-api)
Test transactional email delivery via smtp.com in development
Create Mailchimp audience for NextGen Noise users

tasks.name: Create Email Templates
tasks.description: Welcome, verification, license delivery, password reset, trial expiration, update

tasks.name: Implement Transactional Emails
tasks.description: Send emails for registration, purchase, support, password reset

subtasks.name: Send license key email on purchase

tasks.name: Test Email Delivery
tasks.description: Test all email templates, delivery, rendering

subtasks.name: Verify email rendering in Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail

tasks.name: Build Admin Dashboard Backend
tasks.description: API endpoints for user/license management, analytics, support

subtasks.name: Create admin user roles and permissions
Implement user management endpoints (list, edit, delete)
Implement license management endpoints (create, revoke, view)
Implement analytics endpoints (users, revenue, active licenses)

tasks.name: Build Admin Dashboard Frontend
tasks.description: React/Vue UI for admin operations and analytics

subtasks.name: Create user management page (list, search, edit)

tasks.name: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
tasks.description: Admin, moderator, support roles with permission checking

tasks.name: Test Admin Features
tasks.description: Test all admin operations and access controls

tasks.name: Setup Error Tracking (Sentry)
tasks.description: Capture and monitor application errors

subtasks.name: Test error capture with sample errors

tasks.name: Setup Server Monitoring
tasks.description: CPU, memory, disk usage, uptime monitoring

subtasks.name: Setup Datadog or New Relic account

tasks.name: Setup Log Aggregation
tasks.description: Elasticsearch/Kibana or Loggly for centralized logging

subtasks.name: Setup log aggregation tool (ELK stack or Loggly)
Configure log shipping from app servers
Test log aggregation with sample logs

tasks.name: Configure Alerts
tasks.description: Email/Slack notifications for critical errors

tasks.name: Implement Security Best Practices
tasks.description: HTTPS, password hashing, JWT, rate limiting, input validation, CORS

subtasks.name: Implement password hashing with bcrypt (10+ rounds)
Implement rate limiting (20 requests/minute per IP)
Configure CORS for frontend domain only
Secure environment variables (.env not in git)

tasks.name: Conduct Security Audit
tasks.description: Third-party security review or internal audit

subtasks.name: Review all API endpoints for vulnerabilities
Test data encryption in transit and at rest

tasks.name: Penetration Testing
tasks.description: Authorized security testing (optional, recommended)

subtasks.name: Hire penetration testing firm or conduct internal test
Test API for common vulnerabilities (OWASP Top 10)
Test frontend for XSS, CSRF, etc.

tasks.name: Create Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
tasks.description: Legal documents for compliance

subtasks.name: Add privacy policy link to website
Add terms of service link to website

tasks.name: Implement GDPR Compliance Features
tasks.description: Data export, deletion, consent, anonymization

subtasks.name: Implement user data export endpoint (JSON format)
Add cookie consent banner to website

phases.name: Iteration 2+ Planning (Future Genres & Features)
phases.description: Roadmap for Hard Rock, Pop Punk, and additional features

tasks.name: Hard Rock Genre Support
tasks.description: Add Hard Rock targets and training models

subtasks.name: Generate Hard Rock training dataset (Good/Flawed pairs)
Train Hard Rock specific models (Kick, Snare, Bass, Guitar)
Add Hard Rock targets to genre database
Test Hard Rock genre in Studio One

tasks.name: Pop Punk Genre Support
tasks.description: Add Pop Punk targets and training models

subtasks.name: Add Pop Punk targets to genre database
Test Pop Punk genre in Studio One

tasks.name: Multi-DAW Support
tasks.description: Extend to Logic Pro, Reaper, Ableton Live

subtasks.name: Map Logic Pro stock plugin parameters

tasks.name: Advanced Features
tasks.description: Add A/B comparison, preset system, sidechain assistant

summary.notes: Expansion plan adds licensing, web infrastructure, payment processing, and distribution systems. Original timeline: 17 weeks. Updated timeline: 26 weeks (~6 months).
